questions.stem: She __________ to the cinema every Friday.
If I had more time, I __________ learn to play the guitar.
They have lived in this city __________ five years.
The book, __________ was written last year, is a bestseller.
Neither John nor Mary __________ coming to the party.
I wish I __________ taller.
He is __________ honest man.
If you had studied harder, you __________ passed the exam.
The meeting has been postponed __________ next Tuesday.
Everyone __________ responsible for their own actions.
She sings __________ beautifully.
We __________ to the beach when it started raining.
This cake tastes __________.
He is used to __________ early in the morning.
The house was __________ by the storm.
You should apologize __________ making such a mistake.
There is __________ milk left in the carton.
It is high time we __________ about the problem.
They promised __________ us with the move.
This is the most interesting movie I __________ ever seen.
